roleset.name: look at again
roleset.note: REVIEW-V NOTES: The logic here is: "John reviewed his notes to find errors."VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls 34.1. (from review.01-v)
REVIEW-N NOTES: Roleset based on review.01. Verbnet class assessment-34.1. Framed by Katie. (from review.01-n)

roles.note: arg2 would be better as an attribute, and would match VNcls that way, but oh well. (from review.01-v)

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: Late yesterday, Georgia Gulf said it reviewed the NL proposal as well as interests from ``third parties'' regarding business combinations.
example.arg: the NL proposal as well as interests from ``third parties'' regarding business combinations

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: ``We consider that his bid is an acceptable bid,'' said Sandra Kolber, spokeswoman for [the independent directors' committee]-1 appointed *trace*-1 last May to solicit and review bids for the company in the wake of a dispute between Mr. Drabinsky and Cineplex's major shareholder, MCA Inc.
example.arg: in the wake of a dispute between Mr. Drabinsky and Cineplex's major shareholder, MCA Inc

example.name: with purpose adjunct
example.text: Meanwhile, U.S. Attorney Jerry Rafferty in Denver is reviewing the report prepared by MiniScribe's outside directors, to determine if criminal charges should be brought before a grand jury.
example.arg: U.S. Attorney Jerry Rafferty in Denver
the report prepared by MiniScribe's outside directors
to determine if criminal charges should be brought before a grand jury

example.name: another kind of purpose adjunct
example.text: John reviewed his notes for errors.

example.name: Example with arg 0 and 1
example.text: no mandatory appellate review of capital sentences

example.name: Example with arg 3
example.text: a daily news review of opinions from around the world
example.arg: of opinions from around the world

example.name: Example with tmp and arg 1
example.text: The annual review of China's trade status

example.name: Example with arg 0
example.text: He hopes to try the procedure in people within 5 years following U.S. government review.

example.name: Example with a slightly different arg 0
example.text: It's lengthy review in the legislature

roleset.name: work-of-art
roleset.note: REVIEW-N NOTES: No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from review.02-n)

example.name: Example with all args
example.text: the book review ``Kissing Nature Good-bye'' by StephenMacDonald Leisure& Arts, Sept. 27

example.name: Example with args 0 and 1
example.text: his review of `` Saturday Night With Connie Chung
example.arg: of `` Saturday Night With Connie Chung

example.name: example with args 0 and 2
example.text: His review "The Tide Comes for Ko Ching Hua"
example.arg: "The Tide Comes for Ko Ching Hua"

roleset.name: official ceremony/display
roleset.note: REVIEW-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. No corresponding VNcls. (from review.03-n)

example.name: military usage
example.text: The decoration ceremony included a grand military review and a march - by .
